question: Mero internet kamm garena, aba ke garne?
context: Tapai ko router ko power light jaldai cha bhane router thik cha. Jaldai chhaina bhane power cord check garnuhos. Network stability ka lagi router reset garna saknuhuncha.

question: Mero internet kamm garena, aba ke garne?
context: Internet connectivity ko samasya ka lagi sabai band garera start garnuhos (router ko power off garera 10 sec pachi on garnuhos). Android ma Settings > WiFi ma gayera 'Connected' bhaneko confirm garnuhos. Windows ma WiFi symbol ma right-click garera 'Troubleshoot' option chalaunuhos. Internet nabhaye router reset garnuhos. question: Phone ma balance herna parcha, kasari herne?
context: Phone balance herna ka lagi: 1. Tapai le *123# dial garnu parcha, jun instant balance display gardai cha. 2. question: Recharge garna sakena, aba ke garne?
context: Recharge garna problem bhaye sabhanda pahila recharge card ko code clearly visible cha ki nai confirm garnuhos. Scratched card clear cha bhane *122*recharge code# dial garnuhos. response: Recharge code clearly visible cha ki nai confirm garnuhos, *122*code# dial garnuhos. App bata recharge scan pani garnus. Aba pani nabhaye customer care lai call garera help linos.

question: TV ma signal chaina, aba k garne?
